name: @jaccomeijer/green-reference
description: Reference implementation of green-lib MDX component library

scripts.components: npm run clean && node build-scripts/build.js components
scripts.components-serve: npm run clean && node build-scripts/build.js components-serve
scripts.pages: npm run clean && node build-scripts/build.js pages
scripts.pages-serve: npm run clean && node build-scripts/build.js pages-serve

author: Jacco Meijer (https://www.jaccomeijer.nl)
